example_sentences.jap_sentence: 兵隊ごっこをして遊んだ。

example_sentences.eng_trans: We heard the voices of children at play.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 遊んでいる子供たちの声が聞こえた。

example_sentences.eng_trans: The children had a lot of fun [pleasant time] in the field.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 子供たちは野原で楽しく遊んだ。

example_sentences.eng_trans: The boy enjoyed blowing soap bubbles.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 男の子はシャボン玉を飛ばして遊んだ。

example_sentences.eng_trans: He was enjoying himself [fooling around] while the others were at work.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 他の人たちが働いているのに彼は遊んでいた。

example_sentences.eng_trans: I am not in the mood for fun.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 今，遊ぶ気分にはなれない。

example_sentences.eng_trans: go on a day trip to Kamakura／spend a day in Kamakura
He spent a year in Paris (in order) to study art.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 彼は美術を研究するために1年間パリに遊んだ。

example_sentences.eng_trans: He frequented the red-light district in his youth.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 彼は若いころよく花街に遊んだ。

example_sentences.eng_trans: He is idle because he is out of work now.
I'm taking life easy after my retirement.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 退職後は遊んで暮らしている。

example_sentences.eng_trans: After the car accident I spent a year doing nothing.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 自動車事故の後1年間は遊んで暮らした。
